name: Vinsol
tagline: Helping businesses make the digital transformation
description:
We are a global, agile team of Ruby on Rails, IoT, iOS and Android experts. Pioneers in Ruby on Rails platform, we are one of the very few companies across the globe to adopt Ruby on Rails in very early stages in 2005. Ruby on Rails is our core area of expertise and captures more than 60% of our portfolio. 
Vinsol is also a Premier SpreeCommerce development partner. Vinsol specializes in building robust and scalable e-commerce sites on Spree. Spree is an open source platform built on Ruby on Rails
Specialities:
1) Ruby on Rails Web Applications
2) iOS (iPhone & iPad) Applications
3) Android Phone & Tablet Applications
4) Spree based E-Commerce apps
Our Services Include:
- End-To-End implementation of a project taking complete ownership.
- Phenomenal communication with all stakeholders to ensure clear visibility and understanding.
- A quality development process with the best possible tools and techniques in the industry.
- A highly experienced team to ensure bug-free code.- A competitive pricing scheme for custom development.
Customer Base:
We have a wealth of experience and have a strong customer base in the US, Europe, Africa, and Asia. 
We have helped entrepreneurs in completely building their million dollar startup idea, sometimes entirely from scratch. Disney, BestBuy, Chipotle, OpenTable, Ideeli (now acquired by GroupOn), OfferSlot (now MyTime), Konga, WeWork, RoshReview, Lovetastic, Sequence and many others prove our capabilities.
